text: thumb|Location of Tsuga in Tochigi Prefecture was a town located in Shimotsuga District, Tochigi Prefecture, Japan. As of 2003, the town had an estimated population of 13,635 and a density of 446.76 persons per km². The total area was 30.52 km². On March 29, 2010, Tsuga, along with the towns of Fujioka and Ōhira (all from Shimotsuga District), was merged into the expanded city of Tochigi. ==External links== * Tochigi official website Category:Dissolved municipalities of Tochigi Prefecture
title: Tsuga, Tochigi
